name: Rocketball (itch) (Retro Mechanic)
description:
It's Rocketball, a casual and arcade smart phone game, my first personal project. The game has been released on Android in a local store several years back when I had been working  in a two-man dev group.

Controls :

The controllers of  the game is hybrid , as it's a mobile game, only some of them are converted to keyboard.

Shooting_____________ S (on keyboard)

Change Canon's Angle ___________ Arrow keys (on  keyboard)

* Other icons have interact with mouse
